author: Bob
review: it's pretty cool to see OMOMO grow over time. They definitely exploded after opening in Irvine.

author: Joe
review: I've heard many good things about this place and finally gave it a try. I had the brown sugar boba there and 0 regrets!

author: Jill
review: This is the best boba tea place I have ever been to, and I've tried a lot of places. Iced black almond milk tea and crispy chicken (spicy with the sweet and sour) is perfect.

author: jan
review: This is probably my the best boba shop. I always order Moo Juice. Sometimes I get Karate chicken.
